name: Party Animals (itch) (Ludipe)
description:
Party Animals is a short puzzle game about animals trying to party on a Saturday night.

Made by Ludipe with music and audio made by Hernan Ojuel.

Instructions.-

All the instructions are included in-game. You can move the characters with WASD or the arrow keys. R resets the current level. Z undoes the last move. M mutes audio. F toggles fullscreen.

Misc.-

Made in a couple of days during Christmas and then left in a folder until four months later when the game was finally finished.
